content.text:
# 1961 Delaware Valley Aggies football team

The 1961 Delaware Valley Aggies football team was an American football team that represented Delaware Valley College (now known as Delaware Valley University) of Doylestown, Pennsylvania, as an independent during the 1961 college football season. In their third season under head coach Robert D. Chiodi, the Aggies compiled a 6â€“2 record.
